Question: Flexxon Pte Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Flexxon Pte Ltd

Product 1

- X-PHY® CYBER SECURE SSD with AI-Embedded firmware
- Real-time data protection
- Innovative cybersecurity solutions for exceptional data security
- Industrial grade SSD & NAND products with various form factors
- USB flash memory devices with high performance and low-power consumption
- SD and Micro SD memory cards with high reliability and compatibility
- PATA, SATA, and PCIe NVMe SSDs for industrial and embedded applications
- eMMC storage solution with upgraded technical support and extended life
- WORM SD and Micro SD memory cards for cost-effective, tamper-proof, and immutable data integrity
- Customizable memory solutions with fixed BOM and HMLV approach
- Member of PCI-SIG and NVMe industry associations
- Awarded for innovation and cybersecurity, including the Black Unicorn Award 2021
Summary_cn:
Flexxon Pte Ltd

产品1

- 搭载AI嵌入式固件的X-PHY® CYBER SECURE SSD
- 实时数据保护
- 创新的网络安全解决方案，确保杰出的数据安全性
- 工业级SSD和NAND产品，具有各种形态因素
- 高性能低功耗的USB闪存存储设备
- 高可靠性和兼容性的SD和Micro SD存储卡
- 适用于工业和嵌入式应用的PATA、SATA和PCIe NVMe SSD
- 升级技术支持和延长寿命的eMMC存储解决方案
- 用于经济高效、防篡改和不可变数据完整性的WORM SD和Micro SD存储卡
- 可定制的内存解决方案，采用固定BOM和HMLV方法
- 是PCI-SIG和NVMe行业协会的成员
- 荣获创新和网络安全等奖项，包括2021年的黑独角兽奖
